name: js-data-adapter
description: Base adapter class that all other js-data adapters extend.
author: js-data-adapter project authors

scripts.bundle: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd -o dist/js-data-adapter.js -m dist/js-data-adapter.js.map src/index.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle
scripts.cover: istanbul cover --hook-run-in-context node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 30000 -R dot -r source-map-support/register mocha.start.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run cover
scripts.repo-tools: repo-tools updates && repo-tools changelog && repo-tools authors
scripts.ci: npm run test && cat coverage/lcov.info | codecov
